description: Taste the tropics with a terrific turkey burger topped with juicy chargrilled pineapple. Try this burger recipe for a fresh take on a family favourite.
name: Tropical turkey burgers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Top roll bases with lettuce, patties, pineapple and onion. Sandwich with roll tops, then serve with mayonnaise and sauce.
